content_type.detail:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<j:jelly trim="false" xmlns:j="jelly:core" xmlns:g="glide" xmlns:j2="null" xmlns:g2="null">
  <g:evaluate>
     var gr = new GlideRecord('content_block_iframe');
     gr.initialize();
     gr.frame_name = 'gsft_main';
     var url = RP.getParameterValue('uri');
     if (gs.getProperty("glide.cms.catalog_uri_relative", false) == "true")
        url = GlideSecurityUtils.enforceRelativeURL(url);
     gr.url = url;
     gr.sizing = 'expand';
     gr.putCurrent();
  </g:evaluate>
  <g:render_content_block_iframe />
  <g:evaluate>
     gr.popCurrent();
  </g:evaluate>
</j:jelly>

detail_page.display_value: Lab Info Management - Portal - Default Content

content_type.summary: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?> <j:jelly trim="false" xmlns:j="jelly:core" xmlns:g="glide" xmlns:j2="null" xmlns:g2="null"> ${current.getDisplayValue()} </j:jelly>
